system.requirements:
Red Consecrator Alternative Advance, 750xp
Litany of Hate, Rage of the Zealot
system.effect: Whenever the character inflicts Righteous Fury on a foe, they can spend a Fate Point to make a +0 Fellowship Test. If successful all allies within 30 metres add the Character's Fellowship Bonus to all damage they deal until the Character's next turn.
